message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to make a bit more than $125 to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $140?
I've already gone a bit above my budget, and I really think $125 is the highest I can go. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
